sentences.english: Shunde, a small city in Guangdong, was buried in debt.
sentences.chinese: 而位於廣東省的順德市，此時也是負債累累。

sentences.english: France was 18th, and Greece, saddled with debt, fell to 90th.
sentences.chinese: 法國是第18名，負債累累的希臘降到了第90名。

sentences.english: His gambling losses put him deeply [heavily] in debt.
sentences.chinese: 他因賭博輸錢而負債累累。

sentences.english: Now consumers are so heavily indebted that they cannot borrow more.
sentences.chinese: 現在，消費者如此負債累累，他們已無法借得更多了。

sentences.english: After years of borrowing, Greece is in debt.
sentences.chinese: 在借錢多年之後，希臘負債累累。

sentences.english: The board has so misconducted the affairs of the company that it's deep in debt.
sentences.chinese: 由於董事會對公司管理不善，公司負債累累。

sentences.english: In that case I'd be an unemployed 25 year-old with unpaid debt.
sentences.chinese: 那時我是一個負債累累的失業青年。

sentences.english: Although some homebuilders are heavily indebted, households are not.
sentences.chinese: 雖然一些建築商負債累累，但房屋戶主們並沒有。

sentences.english: Her spending without restraint ran him heavily in debt.
sentences.chinese: 她的揮霍無度使他負債累累。

sentences.english: The depression, however, caused many irrecoverable accounts and Dr. Sim started to run up debts.
sentences.chinese: 然而經濟蕭條造成許多呆帳，他也因此負債累累。

sentences.english: Anne needs to stop swiping her credit cards; she is racking up a huge debt.
sentences.chinese: 安妮真是不能再濫用信用卡了，如今她已負債累累。

sentences.english: Whoever takes charge will inherit an economy laden with debt.
sentences.chinese: 無論誰執政都將面臨負債累累的英國經濟。

sentences.english: He was plunged into debt overnight by gambling.
sentences.chinese: 由於賭博，他一夜之間負債累累。

sentences.english: Plaintiffs chasing him through the courts concluded he was "financially strapped" and "debt-ridden.
sentences.chinese: 律師在法庭上說他“財務艱難”“負債累累”。

sentences.english: Many return to families crippled by debt from months without a breadwinner.
sentences.chinese: 許多人回到家中不能養家餬口，數月以來負債累累。

sentences.english: He ran into debt as a result of drinking too much.
sentences.chinese: 他由於貪杯而負債累累。
